text: Strawberry pie is a dessert food mainly consisting of strawberries and sugar in a pie crust, sometimes with gelatin. It is usually served with whipped cream.Pitzer, Sara (1985). Simply Strawberries: A Cookbook. Pownal, Vermont: Garden Way Publications. pp. 57, 62. ISBN 0-88266-383-6. In the United States, it is one of the red foods often served during Juneteenth celebrations, and is also a popular dessert at Fourth of July gatherings. ==References== Category:Pies Category:Fruit dishes
title: Strawberry pie
